pervert.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to change something in an unnatural and often harmful way
pervert.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Genetic scientists are often accused of perverting nature.
pervert.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to influence someone so that they begin to think or behave in an immoral way
pervert.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: TV violence perverts the minds of young children.
pervert.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone whose sexual behaviour is considered unnatural and unacceptable
